On Campus Students

On campus students will enroll themselves in all 12 credits of the Integrated Business Core (IBC) during the same semester. 

IBC pre-requisites include B 100, B 211, B 212, Acct 201, Acct 202, Econ 150, Econ 151, and B 220 or B 275 or B 298R.  It is required that all students receive at least a C- in all pre-requisites in order to be eligible to move on to the 12-credit IBC.

  • Those wishing to attend the MORNING SESSION (daily from 7:45-10:45 a.m. ) should enroll in 302 Section1, B 322 Section 1, B 342 Section 1, and B 362 Section 1.
  • Those wishing to attend the AFTERNOON SESSION (TR 3-5:30 p.m. and MWF 2-5 p.m.) should enroll in B 302 Section 2, B 322 Section 2, B 342 Section 2, and B 362 Section 2.

Online Students

Online students should visit with an online advisor by phone at 208-496-9900 or email at cbconline@byui.edu to determine their course planning.  Generally, online students do not take all 12 credits in one semester.  Online students should enroll for B 301, B 321, B 341, and B 361.
